title: Henri Konan Bédié, Ivory Coast president deposed in coup, dies at 89
description: He led the West African nation for six years before being overthrown in 1999. In recent years he continued to shape its politics as head of an opposition party.

title: U.S. orders partial evacuation of embassy in Niger amid coup
description: The decision appears aimed at preventing a chaotic exit from the country and comes a day after the U.S. said it had suspended military cooperation with Niger.

title: Turkey investigates reported cancellation of Disney Plus series on Ataturk
description: The six-part series was set to release on the streaming service on Oct. 29 to coincide with the 100th anniversary of the Turkish Republic.

title: It’s midwinter, but it’s over 100 degrees in South America
description: It's been as much as 40 or more degrees above average, and as hot as it usually gets in summer, in some parts of South America.

title: Justin Trudeau, wife announce separation after 18 years of marriage
description: The Canadian prime minister and former television host Sophie Grégoire Trudeau have three children.

title: Snail-paced 100-meter dash for Somali runner raises questions
description: Slow and steady does not win the 100-meter dash, a Somali runner demonstrated at the Summer World University Games in Chengdu, China, this week.

title: U.S. seeks to balance security and human rights in turbulent West Africa
description: Senior U.S. officials are supporting nonlethal military assistance to Burkina Faso, which is threatened by Islamist militants and eyed by Russian mercenaries.

title: In photos: Sturgeon supermoon lights up the night sky worldwide
description: The sturgeon moon , the second-largest moon that has appeared to date this year, was a considered a supermoon. Views from across the globe

title: Typhoons flooded her wedding. She waded down the aisle anyway.
description: Dianne Victoriano decided to go ahead with her nuptials, despite typhoons Doksuri and Khanum pummelling the Philippines and flooding her wedding venue.

title: As extreme heat hits South Korea and Japan, death toll rises sharply
description: South Korea and Japan issued heat alerts as the number of deaths and cases of heatstroke continue to rise. Meanwhile, another typhoon approaches the region.

title: China’s military shake-up may hint at corruption — or Xi Jinping’s weakness
description: China's Xi Jinping reshuffled the People's Liberation Army Rocket Force, which oversees nuclear and missile programs critical to the goal of taking over Taiwan.

title: Ukraine live briefing: U.S. says Kyiv’s counteroffensive moving ahead
description: Ukraine still has significant combat capability, a Pentagon spokesman said in response to a question about whether the bulk of its combat power had been deployed.
